snippet: The Giants’ star defensive end lost his right index finger and severely damaged his right thumb and middle finger in the accident.
abstract: New York Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul meets with press for first time since fireworks accident in July that caused amputation of one of his fingers; says he will be able to adjust and still play well.
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ star defensive end lost his right index finger and severely damaged his right thumb and middle finger in the accident.

headline.print_headline: ‘I’ll Get Used to It,’ Pierre-Paul Says of His Injured Hand
headline.main: Giants’ Jason Pierre-Paul Makes First Comments Since Fireworks Accident
